name: Save the Enemy
description: Everything has been downhill since Zoey Trask's mother was murdered in a random mugging. Her younger brother, Ben, is on the autistic spectrum and needs constant supervision. It's senior year, and she's the new girl at a weird private school in Old Town Alexandria, VA, full of kids who seem too nice to be true-including a very cute boy named Pete.
author: Arin Greenwood
